actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to expedite certain judicial proceedings relating to the Central Utah reclamation project.

summary.text: Provides that any civil action or other judicial proceeding involving compliance with the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969 which affects the construction or operation of the Central Utah Reclamation Project to which any department, agency, or instrumentality of the United States, or any officer or employee of the United States is a party, shall be brought and heard only in accordance with the provisions of this Act. Requires such an action or proceeding to be brought in the central division of the United States district court for the district of Utah, and to be heard by a single judge court.

titles.title: A bill to expedite certain judicial proceedings relating to the Central Utah reclamation project.
